enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
title: JOUR JOUR 404-0-20 Sports and Society

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Seminar explores the myriad issues journalists must understand in order to cover sports in depth. This class is not about covering games. Students write about topics such as steroid abuse, stadium finance, sexual scandals and other issues swirling about professional sports.

subject: JOUR
